channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Amazon is using AI to create video recaps of its biggest streaming shows
item.description: Amazon Prime Video is testing another new generative AI-powered feature to help catch you up on a show you’ve been watching before starting a new season. Video Recaps uses AI to identify a show’s important plot points and create a short but “theatrical-quality” summary video that combines a selection of clips with music, dialogue, and […]

item.title: Pixel 10 phones are now compatible with AirDrop
item.description: Google just announced some unexpected and welcome news: Pixel 10 owners can now send and receive files with Apple devices over AirDrop. According to Google, this works with iPhone, iPad, and macOS devices, and applies to the entire Pixel 10 series. It’s limited to Google’s latest phones for now, but Google spokesperson Alex Moriconi says, […]

item.title: La Black Friday Week fait chuter de moitié le prix du Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G : un très bon smartphone milieu de gamme pour moins de 200 €
item.description: La gamme Redmi de Xiaomi, c’est un peu l’éternel outsider celui qui débarque sur le terrain des smartphones d’entrée et de milieu de gamme en bousculant tout le monde. Sorti en début d’année, le Xiaomi Redmi Note 14 5G se glisse lui aussi dans la danse de la Black Friday Week. Affiché à 399 euros lors de son lancement, il tombe aujourd’hui à 189,10 euros sur AliExpress, grâce à un généreux coupon de réduction. ...

item.title: The New ‘Return to Silent Hill’ Trailer Invites You to Face Your Inner Demons
item.description: 'You Live Here Now' will become a reality when 'Return to Silent Hill' hits theaters in January.

item.title: Énorme rachat dans le vélo électrique : un groupe indien s’empare des marques d’un géant européen
item.description: Plombé par une dette financière importante et des pertes depuis plus de 2 ans, Pierer cède sa filiale Pierer Mobility à Bajaj Auto, et avec elle les marques de vélos électriques Husqvarna, Gasgas et Felt.

item.title: CDC Website Now Boosts Debunked Link Between Vaccines and Autism
item.description: "This represents a new and devastating turn by the CDC."

item.title: Blue Origin reveals a super-heavy variant of its New Glenn rocket that is taller than a Saturn V
item.description: The nine-engine variant can carry larger payloads and more closely matches the capabilities of SpaceX's largest rocket, Starship.

item.title: Letterboxd to launch new movie rental feature in December
item.description: Letterboxd is entering the movie rental business with a new digital video store that allows users to rent titles directly on the platform.

item.title: Amazon’s latest entry-level Kindle has fallen to a new low for Black Friday
item.description: Carrying around a full stack of physical books isn’t practical, but an e-reader lets you take a full library with you anywhere. Thankfully, Amazon’s latest Kindle is currently on sale at Amazon, Best Buy, and Target in its ad-supported configuration for $79.99 ($30 off) or without ads for $99.99 ($30 off), which is a new […]

item.title: Garmin vs Apple : quelle montre connectée choisir ? [vidéo]
item.description: Trouver la montre connectée parfaite reste un défi tant les modèles se distinguent par leurs points forts et leurs faiblesses. Entre la polyvalence des smartwatches comme l'Apple Watch SE3 et la précision des montres sportives comme la Garmin Forerunner 255, le choix dépend avant tout des priorités et besoins de chacun.

item.title: Le Pixel 9a à 299 euros : Orange vient de tuer le game du milieu de gamme
item.description: La réalité ? Trouver un meilleur photophone à moins de 300 euros est impossible aujourd'hui. Avec cette offre d'Orange sur le Pixel 9a, la concurrence est simplement K.O.

item.title: New Chromebooks will come with a year of Nvidia’s cloud gaming ‘fast pass’
item.description: Nvidia has partnered with Google to launch a new cloud gaming plan exclusive to Chromebooks. GeForce Now Fast Pass will allow Chromebook owners to stream over 2,000 games directly from an existing PC game library without ads, and new Chromebook purchases will include a year’s membership for free. Fast Pass looks similar to GeForce Now’s […]

item.title: Google’s Gemini is now on Android Auto
item.description: Move over Google Assistant, there’s a new robot to yell at while driving. Starting today, Google is rolling out its Gemini AI assistant to Android Auto users, allowing drivers access to a “truly conversational” voice assistant who can help with directions, messages, and errands. With Gemini, “you can just speak naturally, have a back and […]

item.title: As Windows turns 40, Microsoft faces an AI backlash
item.description: It feels like Microsoft is blindly racing toward another Windows 8 situation. Windows 8 was arguably the most divisive release of Windows in its 40-year history, as Microsoft attempted to overhaul the operating system for a touch-first future. Spooked by the iPad, the company shipped a radical overhaul that ditched the familiar Start menu and […]

item.title: Gemini starts rolling out to Android Auto globally
item.description: Gemini will replace Google Assistant and give drivers the ability to make playlists, access email, and learn about a city — all through voice.

item.title: Google’s Gemini 3 Pro: Better than mid
item.description: The new model could be a milestone in the AI industry’s quest for human-level intelligence Welcome to AI Decoded, Fast Company’s weekly newsletter that breaks down the most important news in the world of AI. I’m Mark Sullivan, a senior writer at Fast Company, covering emerging tech, AI, and tech policy.

item.title: Origami Holiday Tree returns to Manhattan’s American Museum of Natural History
item.description: This year’s theme for the tree is ‘New Beginnings,’ in reference to the new world that followed the mass extinction of dinosaurs. A beloved Christmas tree tradition is returning to Manhattan for the holiday season next week. No, it’s not the towering spruce at Rockefeller Center, which is lit in early December.

item.description: Looking for a super cheap gaming PC for Black Friday? This ABS with an RTX 5060 is just $799 at Newegg today.

C'est sûrement l'offre la plus abordable du moment pour jouer agréablement sur PC et profiter d'un Game Pass moins cher que sur console.

item.title: Snow in Hawaii, but Not in Denver? What the Actual…
item.description: Snow in Hawaii isn't as unusual as you might think, but some northern U.S. cities are seeing significant delays to the start of their winter season.

La tout récente Nintendo Switch 2 est bien sûr la grande vedette cette année, mais la PS5 n'a pas non plus dit son dernier mot...

Meta is about to get some new competition in the AR-powered smart glasses space: A little-known company called Vonderful Inc. is gearing up to launch its first pair of AI […]

item.title: This Frida Kahlo self-portrait could shatter auction records
item.description: With an estimated price of $40 million to $60 million, the painting may surpass the top price for a work by any female artist. A 1940 self-portrait by famed Mexican artist Frida Kahlo of her asleep in a bed could make history Thursday when it goes on sale by Sotheby’s in New York.

item.title: The 32 best gifts that your teen will actually use
item.description: Between keeping up with TikTok trends and whatever new gadget just dropped, it's tough to know exactly what teens are into these days. Luckily, we can help. We may be older than teenagers, but many of us here at The Verge are kids at heart. Plus, we've also got a few staffers with older kids. […]

item.title: Avec le support des caméras, Matter progresse mais les constructeurs sont en ordre dispersé
item.description: Le jour où il sera possible de gérer toute la domotique de sa maison connectée aussi facilement que d'appuyer sur l'interrupteur de la lumière n'est pas encore arrivé. On en est encore très loin au vu des chapelles, des résistances et des protocoles qui s'entrechoquent. L'industrie, consciente qu'un minimum d'interopérabilité est nécessaire, a fait un effort en planchant sur un standard commun, Matter, qui évolue aujourd'hui en version 1.5. Les nouveautés sont intéressantes… mais encore faut-il que tous les acteurs jouent le jeu....

item.title: After SEC investigation, Curastory founder resigns, hires replacement
item.description: Curastory’s founder and CEO, Tiffany Kelly, has resigned from the role and replaced herself with Dave Dickman, former CEO of the influencer marketing platform Tagger.

item.title: Swatch's New OpenAI-Powered Tool Lets You Design Your Own Watch
item.description: The new AI-DADA tool lets you create a unique Swatch design using AI prompts. You can't make a custom MoonSwatch yet—but it's not entirely off the table.

item.title: This year's best PS5 Black Friday deals – offers on consoles, accessories, games, and more
item.description: These are the best early sales and discounts live now, ahead of the Black Friday PS5 deals starting properly tomorrow.

item.title: DDR4 vs DDR5 en 2025 : l’erreur qui bride votre PC de 20 %
item.description: On le sait, les prix de la RAM s'envolent à cause de l'IA. La tentation est grande de recycler votre vieux kit DDR4 pour accompagner un Core i5-12400F. Mauvaise idée. Hardware Unboxed vient de démontrer que cette petite économie transforme votre PC de jeu en tracteur. Regardez les chiffres.

item.description: A critical WordPress plugin flaw allows threat actors to run arbitrary PHP commands, potentially taking over entire websites.

item.title: Moss Survives 9 Months Outside ISS, Somehow Keeps Growing Once Back on Earth
item.description: “It is a powerful reminder that life is far more resilient than we often imagine.”

item.title: Shopping for toys this holiday season? Avoid the AI ones, groups warn parents
item.description: AI toys are generally powered by models that have already been shown to harm children and teenagers. They’re cute, even cuddly, and promise learning and companionship—but artificial intelligence toys are not safe for kids, according to children’s and consumer advocacy groups urging parents not to buy them during the holiday season.

item.title: Des centaines de satellites lancés... sans fusée : la folle technologie qui promet une conquête de l’espace 100 % propre
item.description: L'industrie spatiale assiste à une révolution technologique majeure avec l'émergence du canon centrifuge de SpinLaunch. Cette startup californienne promet de transformer radicalement le déploiement de satellites en orbite basse. Pourra-t-elle rivaliser avec les géants établis comme SpaceX grâce...

item.description: Spotify has partnered with TuneMyMusic on a new in-app feature that lets users import their playlists from other streaming services.
